column1: Ate at the location on central. Great catfish and shrimp! The homemade tarter sauce and cocktail sauce are the best I have had!
Came in by boat. They have nice slips to pull into. Nice hike through the gardens. Also good for dogs!
Very nice park for camping. Also has great trails for walking. I take my dogs there when I can. Beautiful place!
We eat there all the time. It is by far the best pizza I have ever had! Very fresh ingredients and lots of selections.
We eat there all the time. It is by far the best pizza I have ever had! Very fresh ingredients and lots of selections.

Visited Garza Blanca for two weeks (Sept. 27 - Oct. 11). Wonderful resort. Absolutely beautiful. The service was exceptional. Never waited for anything. Ro...
Wonderful safe place to shop and eat, right on the ocean. Very nice shops. Also, bars and restaurants right on the beach.
This is an okay place to go. The beach was very crowded. The restaurants serve fresh oysters right out of the ocean.
Beautiful rocks. Also an okay place to snorkel but a very pretty site. Good place to get some pictures.
Very nice new marina. We did two excursions out of this marina. Very clean and safe. Also have a restaurant and some vendors.
Very good restaurant with an awesome view of the ocean and Los Arcos. We ate breakfast and dinner here. Lots of choices on the menu.
Great restaurant with wonderful steaks. Ate here a couple of times. Also has an awesome view. The flank steak melt in your mouth!
Loved this excursion! Wonderful beach and jungle. Lots of secluded places to relax and enjoy the beach. Hammocks in the water! The lunch was wonderful. Thi...
column3: Vallarta Adventures - Las Caletas Beach Hideaway

column1: Great excursion. Got to swim and ride the dolphins! They love belly rubs! Plan to take the grandkids next time!

column1: Took my 3 year old grandson. Lots of activities for children. Nice snack bar. Walking trail also. We had a great time.
Wonderful place for kids, enjoyed the waterpark and the amusement park! Food is overpriced but is that way at all amusement parks.
